name: Ulf
body:
### Useful Little Functions
A descendent of ALF, ULF tries to make your life easier by providing wrapper functions for commonly needed functions. 

```
install.package("devtools")
library(devtools)
install_github("ULF","bestdan")
library(ULF)
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
